column4: Im trying to reinstall the grub bootloader because windows wiped it out. I load the live cd and it asks for a user name and password. When I hit enter it opens the ubuntu desktop, but when I click the mouse, Ubuntu restarts. Anyone know how I can get in the live cd?
the password for the live cd is ubuntu I think, and just boot it up agian
re boot  it should automatically go into the live session
